attributes.action: Stop immigrant workers claiming child benefits for their children who live outside of the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 5000 polish immigrant workers currently claim child benefits from the British tax payer for their families back home in Poland. These children have never lived in the UK, so they should not be entitled to British child benifits.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop immigrant workers claiming child benefits for their children who live outside of the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18633


Prime Minister's Office
